data:
## function_createProgressbar
> **createProgressbar**(`config`?): [`ProgressbarWidget`](#progressbarwidget)

Create an ProgressbarWidget with given config props

### Parameters

• **config?**: [`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops)\>

an optional progress bar config

### Returns

[`ProgressbarWidget`](#progressbarwidget)

an ProgressbarWidget

## function_getProgressbarDefaultConfig
> **getProgressbarDefaultConfig**(): [`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Progressbar config

### Returns

[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops)

the default Progressbar config

## interface_ProgressbarDirectives
Interface representing directives for a progress bar component.

### Properties

#### ariaDirective

> **ariaDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

A directive to be applied to the main container that handles aria attributes.

## interface_ProgressbarProps
Interface representing the properties for the Progressbar component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

The aria label.

##### Default Value

`'Progressbar'`

***

#### ariaValueTextFn

> **ariaValueTextFn**: (`value`, `minimum`, `maximum`) => `undefined` \| `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-valuetext' attribute.

##### Parameters

• **value**: `number`

current value

• **minimum**: `number`

minimum value

• **maximum**: `number`

maximum value

##### Returns

`undefined` \| `string`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => undefined
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`

The maximum value.

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### min

> **min**: `number`

The minimum value.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### value

> **value**: `number`

The current value.

##### Default Value

`0`

## interface_ProgressbarState
Represents the state of a progress bar component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

The aria label.

##### Default Value

`'Progressbar'`

***

#### ariaValueText

> **ariaValueText**: `undefined` \| `string`

The aria value text.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### finished

> **finished**: `boolean`

`true` if the value has reached its maximum value.

***

#### max

> **max**: `number`

The maximum value.

##### Default Value

`100`

***

#### min

> **min**: `number`

The minimum value.

##### Default Value

`0`

***

#### percentage

> **percentage**: `number`

Percentage of completion.

***

#### started

> **started**: `boolean`

`true` if the value is above its minimum value.

***

#### value

> **value**: `number`

The current value.

##### Default Value

`0`

## type alias_ProgressbarWidget
> **ProgressbarWidget**: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`ProgressbarProps`](#progressbarprops), [`ProgressbarState`](#progressbarstate), `object`, [`ProgressbarDirectives`](#progressbardirectives)\>

Represents a Progressbar widget with specific properties, state, API, and directives.
